# 股票原始数据检查 -- 2008 年 A 股


## 每个月的数据是一个 RAR 压缩包

#### MD5 码

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ md5sum *.rar
ca65d04baa5ca9112481f7618da6046a  Stk_Tick_200801.rar
e03de9658c2b15596c81da84f322edf5  Stk_Tick_200802.rar
c74f4364b39cfbcba76a53d37f693f5b  Stk_Tick_200803.rar
27adaf87dbb584fba1ee4ae634d92c04  Stk_Tick_200804.rar
f48e932da4476ddfbbd3572a9f265bb3  Stk_Tick_200805.rar
4fc785d934170b3a4868c8885262bda6  Stk_Tick_200806.rar
2bb5c8497e63d88f762eaefd6de3e5ec  Stk_Tick_200807.rar
b7b457afc3819071c79e388d7c4c6d2b  Stk_Tick_200808.rar
daedbf946f9fd4d9477380dfa21a2459  Stk_Tick_200809.rar
8666c61dd69d94d33fae6a952360666b  Stk_Tick_200810.rar
6db6f2a4fd97b7a2c3ca9d5ad985f376  Stk_Tick_200811.rar
c8bacd9a35958178a215542236af3dc0  Stk_Tick_200812.rar
```

#### 文件大小

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ du -h *.rar
1.1G	Stk_Tick_200801.rar
655M	Stk_Tick_200802.rar
913M	Stk_Tick_200803.rar
861M	Stk_Tick_200804.rar
939M	Stk_Tick_200805.rar
761M	Stk_Tick_200806.rar
970M	Stk_Tick_200807.rar
692M	Stk_Tick_200808.rar
597M	Stk_Tick_200809.rar
613M	Stk_Tick_200810.rar
825M	Stk_Tick_200811.rar
1.1G	Stk_Tick_200812.rar
```

## 每天一个目录，每只股票一个 CSV 文件

解压，最终的输出一定要是 *"All OK"*, 否则，说明个别文件解压出错。

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ unrar x Stk_Tick_200810.rar
...
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399917_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399918_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399919_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399920_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399921_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399922_20081031.csv            OK
All OK
```

解压后文件夹大小

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ du -lh -d 1 .
7.8G	./Stk_Tick_200803
9.5G	./Stk_Tick_200801
8.0G	./Stk_Tick_200805
5.5G	./Stk_Tick_200810
7.3G	./Stk_Tick_200804
6.1G	./Stk_Tick_200808
5.4G	./Stk_Tick_200809
5.8G	./Stk_Tick_200802
7.3G	./Stk_Tick_200811
6.6G	./Stk_Tick_200806
9.5G	./Stk_Tick_200812
8.4G	./Stk_Tick_200807
87G	.
```

人工 check 每一天的数据都存在。
三两分钟就 check 完 1 年的数据，投入产出比还是比较高的。

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:/mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ ls -d */ | xargs ls
Stk_Tick_200801/:
20080102  20080104  20080108  20080110	20080114  20080116  20080118  20080122	20080124  20080128  20080130
20080103  20080107  20080109  20080111	20080115  20080117  20080121  20080123	20080125  20080129  20080131
```

2008 年一共开盘 246 天，休息了 119 天。其中 108 天周末，11 天法定假期。

```bash
root@4ff4e34b3c6c:/src# python scan/day_count.py /mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2008/
days in Month 01: 22
days in Month 02: 16
days in Month 03: 21
days in Month 04: 21
days in Month 05: 20
days in Month 06: 20
days in Month 07: 23
days in Month 08: 21
days in Month 09: 19
days in Month 10: 20
days in Month 11: 20
days in Month 12: 23
Total: 246 days in 12 months
stock count of each day:
[1564, 1604, 1601, 1598, 1593, 1604, 1606, 1598, 1591, 1594, 1590, 1584, 1576, 1593, 1607, 1608, 1610, 1606, 1607, 1616, 1614, 1606, 1615, 1610, 1636, 1632, 1628, 1621, 1608, 1618, 1612, 1621, 1606, 1607, 1619, 1628, 1630, 1621, 1632, 1637, 1627, 1629, 1631, 1626, 1631, 1614, 1628, 1629, 1614, 1621, 1629, 1615, 1612, 1621, 1624, 1619, 1626, 1604, 1619, 1631, 1616, 1628, 1626, 1613, 1621, 1615, 1618, 1623, 1612, 1623, 1620, 1579, 1597, 1598, 1610, 1617, 1598, 1591, 1591, 1615, 1622, 1618, 1629, 1583, 1601, 1614, 1565, 1613, 1568, 1566, 1604, 1602, 1628, 1623, 1625, 1626, 1638, 1615, 1634, 1626, 1648, 1650, 1655, 1648, 1643, 1655, 1659, 1645, 1660, 1647, 1663, 1652, 1665, 1646, 1666, 1680, 1674, 1655, 1633, 1622, 1696, 1700, 1705, 1708, 1695, 1701, 1704, 1704, 1696, 1697, 1697, 1702, 1701, 1705, 1705, 1712, 1713, 1711, 1700, 1704, 1710, 1709, 1704, 1712, 1720, 1716, 1708, 1716, 1722, 1717, 1719, 1724, 1724, 1700, 1706, 1722, 1714, 1719, 1722, 1721, 1726, 1723, 1725, 1731, 1726, 1729, 1732, 1731, 1718, 1725, 1732, 1731, 1733, 1718, 1715, 1729, 1735, 1727, 1728, 1733, 1734, 1724, 1710, 1718, 1724, 1722, 1722, 1711, 1714, 1728, 1714, 1733, 1727, 1731, 1734, 1727, 1719, 1729, 1725, 1735, 1732, 1728, 1735, 1730, 1738, 1729, 1729, 1728, 1724, 1719, 1727, 1726, 1714, 1707, 1714, 1730, 1722, 1717, 1726, 1722, 1725, 1721, 1708, 1720, 1733, 1723, 1732, 1727, 1725, 1729, 1737, 1727, 1718, 1724, 1733, 1745, 1735, 1737, 1731, 1747, 1745, 1734, 1723, 1693, 1738, 1738]
```
